resources.string: THIS A PRIVATE ORGANIZATION. IT IS NOT PART OF THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE OR ANY OF ITS COMPONENTS AND IT HAS NO GOVERNMENTAL STATUS.

1. You are required to show your driver your military ID to be picked up. 

 2. The driver will only take you to your home address. 

 3. Groups will only be taken to single address. 

 4. Your pickup location must be within 25 miles of your duty station.

PRIVACY: A2D2 is an anonymous program. None of your provided information will be stored or given to leadership at anytime. \n\n DISCLAIMER: This is a private organization. It is not part of the Department of Defense or any of its components and it has no governmental status.
Use Location?\n\nThis app wants to change
You have not allowed the A2D2 app to access your GPS location. Without this permission, the app cannot function. Please go to your phone settings and enable the GPS permission.
You have not allowed the A2D2 app to access your phone\'s calling application
Are you sure you want to dispatch a driver to your current location?
